plugin_desc: Used for real-time monitoring of Consul service health, collecting status check results, analyzing passing, warning, and critical metrics to help users promptly identify issues and ensure service availability.
name: Consul

metrics.name: consul_health_checks_status
metrics.description: This metric represents the status of the health check in Consul, where 0=passing, 1=warning, 2=critical.

metrics.name: consul_health_checks_passing
metrics.description: This metric indicates the number of passing health checks, used to monitor the health status of services.

metrics.name: consul_health_checks_warning
metrics.description: This metric shows the number of health checks in warning status, used to monitor potential issues.

metrics.name: consul_health_checks_critical
metrics.description: This metric shows the number of health checks in critical status, used to monitor critical failures.
